com.groupA.location.world

Class LoggingManagerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.groupA.location.world.LoggingManagerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeGroupActivity.ChangeGroupListener, DownloadOthersActivity.DownloadOthersListener, LoggingClient.ClientListener, RegisterActivity.RegisterListener

    public class LoggingManagerFragment
extends Fragment
implements LoggingClient.ClientListener, RegisterActivity.RegisterListener, DownloadOthersActivity.DownloadOthersListener, ChangeGroupActivity.ChangeGroupListener
    Deals with logging-related functions. Also contains an instance of the client, to deal with low-level login, logout and message-passing functionalities.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LoggingManagerFragment.LoggingManagerListener
      The activity that deals with the manager -- that is, MainActivity -- must implement the following functions:

        If the current location becomes unavailable, stop logging positions.

      • onAttach

        public void onAttach(Activity activity)
        This gets called when the class is instantiated. It checks that the main activity implements the interface LoggingManagerListener; and if so, it stores that implementation in mListener (to be able to invoke it if necessary). Otherwise, it raises an exception.
